FEEDBACK.RAITING: How can you rate a car?

SEARCH.MANUAL_TEXT: Drive hybrid! Renting a hybrid car in Crete is a step into the future. Air emissions are reduced by up to 30%. Save CO2 and money - the motto of your holiday!
SEARCH.AUTOMATIC_TEXT: Cars with an automatic transmission are distinguished by their utmost ease of use, high build quality and, as a rule, high comfort
SEARCH.CABRIO_TEXT: Cabriolet - the best choice for trips around the island of Crete. At the wheel of such a car, you can easily enjoy the fresh sea air, bask in the sun and just ride with the wind
SEARCH.MINIVAN_TEXT: Minivan - ideal for large companies, whether it is a large family, or just friends who decide to have a good rest
SEARCH.HATCHBACK_TEXT: This car is suitable for those who can not choose between comfort, spaciousness and speed. Hatchbacks are characterized by high capacity, relative to the size, as well as incredible dynamics
SEARCH.BSC_TEXT: What car you choose - you will take on arrival.
SEARCH.FINAL_PRICE_TEXT: You see the FINAL car rental price with our company. No hidden taxes and extra insuranses. Our rates include 24% VAT, Insurance, unlimited Mileage, 24 hours road assistance all over Crete.
SEARCH.INSURANCE_TEXT:
Collision damage waiver (CDW)
Personal accident insurance (PAI)
Theft & Fire insurance
Liability Insurance (LI)
SEARCH.ATTENTION: Pick up/Drop of at the Airport
SEARCH.ATTENTION_TEXT: We have office in Heraklion (Chania) Airport. You can collect and return car directly at Airport.
SEARCH.ACCURATY_TEXT: Communicate to us the desired location and time of car renting on Crete
SEARCH.AGE_TEXT: Be over 21 years old for A,B categories and 24 years old for C, C1, D, E, L, L1, L2
SEARCH.LICENSE_TEXT: Have a valid driver's license held for at least one year.
SEARCH.SR_TEXT: Know rules of the road and never violate them
SEARCH.CARE_TEXT: Take care of the rented car as of your own!

CARS.TEXT:
Hire a car in Crete

A car will become your best ally when exploring Crete. We keep our car fleet in impeccable condition, so your vehicle will be very clean, and will have passed a strict technical inspection. Our website allows you Hire a cars of different brands, horsepower and configuration to adapt to your needs whether you are travelling in Crete. Automatic, manual, hybrid and electric cars we suggest for rent in Crete. Additionally, you will have access to continuous information and technical support during your journey.

To rent a car with us you can book it on this page www.car4crete.com or right us on chat/whats up directly. We are online 24/7.

USER.NAME: Name
USER.NO_ORDERS: You haven't make any order yet
USER.SHOULD_ENTER_PROFILE: You should sign in or sign up

CONDITIONS.QUICK: Quick pick-up / return directly at the Airport
CONDITIONS.FINAL: Final price and No Extra payment

CONTACTS.TEXT:
Car Hire CAR4CRETE is here to welcome you! If you are going to visit Crete, you will definitely need a reliable rent a car company. Our goal is to help you feel at home on the island. Just get in a rented car and start exploring the sights of Crete with comfort, at your own pace and according to your own schedule.

Hire a car to be delivered to the airport of Heraklion, Port and our manager will be waiting for you at the arrivals exit of the airport/port with a welcome sign. If you wish to start your journey from a hotel, we will ensure your vehicle is there at the right time. Would you like car rental on amoudara - here is our mane office.

Booking a car in Crete with CAR4CRETE is very easy. Write to online chat, call on telephone or Whats up, mail us. We are in touch 24/7 - before you come and when you are in Crete.

POLICY.HEADER: To rent a car with CAR4CRETE, you should:
POLICY.TEXT:
1. Communicate to us the desired location and time of car renting on Crete
  2. Be over 21 years old and have a valid driver's license held for at least one year.
  3. Never drive under the influence
  4. Know rules of the road and never violate them
  5. Take care of the rented car as of your own!
POLICY.ATTENTION_TEXT: The insurance policy does not cover incidents that have occurred due to violation of traffic rules, or because of the driver, who was intoxicated. Insuranse does not apply, when driving off the road.
